marked stitch straps left side strap facing top attach your strap colour to the 3rd stitch of your last wheel chain 1 row 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next 2 3 sts* chain 1 turn 3 4 sts row 2 single_crochet 3 4 chain 1 turn 3 4 sts row 3 onwards repeat row 2 until your strap measures approximately 30cm check that this length will reach over your shoulder to the back of your top allowing 1 3cm extra to sew to the inside fasten_off attach same colour to the right side top wheel at the 3rd 2nd st repeat above row with your tapestry needle sew the end of each strap to the inside of the back 2 or 3 wheels apart further detail and photos on page 8 *strap width options left image here is 4 single_crochet width right image is 3 single_crochet width button section optional decide on which colour you will use to work your button bands and have 3 5mm hook ready attach yarn to the left of the point at a to work up the left edge to b row 1 single_crochet in same space single_crochet evenly up the left edge to b chain 1 turn i have approx 24 sts across 16 row or 8 wheels row 2 1 single_crochet in each st to end chain 1 turn row 3 repeat row 2 fasten_off attach yarn to top right corner c to work down the right edge to a row 1 single_crochet in same space single_crochet evenly up the left edge to b chain 1 turn i have approx 24 sts across 16 row or 8 wheels row 2 skip 1st st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet each st to end chain 1 turn this is where you can add a little extra room for a larger bust work a row of scs now then repeat row 2 so that you
